title: Rupee plunges further, USD at Rs. 330/-
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The selling price of the US dollar at licensed commercial banks had risen to Rs.330/- on Monday (11).
The selling price of the British pound is Rs.431/- and the buying price is Rs.414/-.
